channel.title: Placements on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Placements on Universal

item.title: Go is for lovers
item.description: .image-left { display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; float: right; } Hugo uses the excellent go html/template library for its template engine. It is an extremely lightweight engine that provides a very small amount of logic. In our experience that it is just the right amount of logic to be able to create a good static website. If you have used other template systems from different languages or frameworks you will find a lot of similarities in go templates.
